tool_description: Searches and retrieves appliances from a comprehensive database based on type, specifications, brand preferences, and budget constraints.

appliance_type.description: Type of appliance: refrigerator, oven, cooktop, dishwasher, microwave, range_hood, garbage_disposal, ice_maker, wine_cooler

energy_rating_min.description: Minimum Energy Star rating (A through F)

error_messages: Invalid appliance type: Use one of [refrigerator, oven, cooktop, dishwasher, microwave, range_hood, garbage_disposal, ice_maker, wine_cooler]
Invalid budget range: budget_min must be less than budget_max and both must be positive
Invalid energy rating: Use A, B, C, D, E, or F for energy_rating_min
No results found: No appliances match the specified criteria, try expanding search parameters
usage: Specify appliance_type and optionally set budget constraints, preferred brands, and minimum energy rating to get matching appliances with detailed specifications.

appliance_models.description: Array of appliance model names and numbers

prices.description: Array of appliance prices in USD

dimensions.description: Array of appliance dimensions as 'W x D x H' in inches
